text: Ponte Lambro is a comune in the Province of Como in the Lombardy region in Italy. == Twin towns == * Zawiercie, Poland, since 2004 * Kamianets-Podilskyi, Ukraine, since 2006 * Cortale, Italy, since 2010 * Carbone, Italy, since 2010 == References == Category:Settlements in Como
title: Ponte Lambro
